column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Tried this place for the first time last weekend. I would say it's a couple steps up from IHOP. Our coffee mugs had a little bit of food leftover from the previous user
column2: which our server spotted as she was setting them down on our table. She quickly took them back and got us new (clean) cups. For food I had the garden skillet which came with mushrooms
column5: and broccoli mixed with eggs and cheese over potatoes. The portions were huge! I could only finish 1/3 of my dish. Overall it was good
